author: clement
msg: Merge the sandbox version with the last commit from the trunk (from the 615742 to 620828 revisions). The merge generalizes the usage of the latest maven-bundle-plugin (1.4.0).
Fix a bug in the maven plugin when using the archetype (the metadata files was not copied correctly).

author: dwoods
msg: GERONIMO-3926 Add a Derby config/plugin for easier inclusion of Derby jars without a system-database depend

author: vhennebert
msg: Changed the documentation to reflect the move to Java 1.4 as a minimum requirement

author: senaka
msg: Fixing User-Agent Header to suit definition in RFC2616, [1]. And, removing hardcoded header names in tcpmon.c
